Data Visualisation and Analysis
ISS_dataviz • Spring 2026

Tim Marchand • Faculty of International Social Sciences • Gakushuin University

This repository contains the course materials, data, and code for the Data Visualisation and Analysis course. The full course website is deployed via GitHub Pages and is available at https://timmarchand.github.io/ISS_dataviz/.

Credits
This repository is a fork of andrewheiss/datavizsp26.classes.andrewheiss.com.
If you are an educator looking to adapt or build your own version of this course, please visit the outstanding reference repository created by Andrew Heiss.
